1121.content: "Eeeehhhhmmmmhh..." You say, and scratches the back of your head, looking away! After a couple seconds, you hesitatingly say to her "yyyoooouuuu DO know that you are a WEREWOLF, right?" She looks at you for a while begore saying "... What??" You blush, as you think this is really awkward! "I mean... You are a werewolf, and you asked me why i didn't wanna yave sex with YOU, since i have had sex with another woman, before! And that is because.. Well.. You're a WEREWOLF! But you didn't seem to KNOW that, so i asked you, if you knew if you where a werewolf!" You say and look at her, Smilling like an idiot! "What kinda joke is THAT??" She asked you after a while, of looking at you like you where a MENTAL PATIENT! "Or is it some kinda SLANG, for HAIRY?" You blushed, and said "NO NO NO NO NO!! It's not that! I mean you really ARE a werewolf!" Getting tored of this she asks you, with a ANNOYED tone, in her voice "alright, smart guy! how can i be a werewolf, when werewolves don't EXIST??! And don't you think that i would have KNOWN it, if i where a werewolf?? Or have people after me?" "Ye, and i don't know how or why nothing of that have happened, but it's TRUE!" "Then show me some EVIDENCE!" she says, annoyed! "Uuuuuhhhmmm... Ok!..." You say, and think for a while, before remembering that you have you IPHONE, in your pocket! You take your iphone out of your pocket, and snap her photo, before showing it to her! "Look!" You say, and show her the picture! She raises an eyebrow in surprise, before she says "and how do i know you haven't manipulated that, or something? Theres an APP for more or less EVERYTHING, now!" "Well..." You start "i could never have made something THAT detailed, on a IPHONE! AND.. I have never heard of a APP, that can let me do something like THIS!" You say, and show her the picture again! "But that's IMPOSSIBLE! Werewolves dosen't even EXIST!! They're only FOLKLOR!" She says, starting too panic slightly! "Fine! I'll FILM you, as well!" You say, and start filming her, then You step in front of the camera, wave and stuff, too show her, that it weren't prerecorded! "THERE " you say, and show it too her! As she looks at the video, her brain is running itself RAGGED, trying to make sense of all this! Not only was werewolves REAL, but SHE was actually a REAL LIVE werewolf, HERSELF! How does she react?
1121.title: AAAAAWKWAAAAARD!

1123.content: You are terrified. While you were walking home a werewolf confronts you and asks for sex. You think for less than a second before turning and sprinting back the way you came. "Don't leave!" echoes in your head as you dash away from the lustfull beast. At the end of the path you turn right slipping on the pavement and scrambling back to your feet, glancing over to see the wolf-girl chasing you. "please stay" you hear in your mind. The voice was piteous but you forced yourself to ignore it. Werewolves were incredibly dangerous, and you didn't want any trouble. You sprint for an unknown length of time. Running through back alleys and passages until you are decidedly lost. You turn one last corner before slumping against the wall, gasping. The cool air of the night rapidly entering and leaving your lungs. As you catch your breath you peek around the corner, but you see no sign of the wolf. Sighing in relief you close your eyes and lean your head against the wall. Opening your eyes, you are greeted by the sight of two feral eyes staring into yours.
1123.title: Just Run

12.content:
You're walking home one night, eager to get home. You decide to take a back road as a shortcut to make it there faster.
You look up at the sky and see that it's a full moon. For some reason, this gives you a bad feeling...you shake it off and continue.
Suddenly, a dark shape drops down in front of you. Its back is to a streetlight, so you cant really make it out. You jump back a little, startled.
The figure takes a few steps towards you. As it comes into the light, you can see that it's just a man...a very tall, muscular man. You take a few steps back, ready to run when he speaks.
"Ah ah ah, dont be so hasty to leave. the fun is just getting started" He grins wickedly and keeps walking towards you.

What do you do?
12.title: Quite a predicament
